title: Import Microsoft Remote Desktop Client backups
author: MrChriZ
body_snippet:
## Desired Behavior
At present it's possible to import remote desktop connection manager and RDP files.
However as far as I can see there's no support for the Microsoft Remote Desktop app backupfiles:
https://apps.microsoft.com/store/detail/microsoft-remote-desktop/9WZDNCRFJ3PS?hl=en-gb&gl=GB
These have the extension .rdb.

## Current Behavior
Currently not supported

## Context
I'm a poor soul coming from another Microsoft product (I have seen the errors of my ways) and I'm having to ...

comments.snippet:
Hi @MrChriZ

I now it's a pity to be migrating, unfortunately this is a feature request alredy filed in issues #2219, #2015 and #839. You may want to look into them briefly...

I hope you can manage the migration in the meantime with not too much beer ≡ƒÿë 
Regards
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet:
Hi @simonai1254 
Thanks for your concern ≡ƒÿà.

I believe RDCMan is a different Microsoft RDP client product.  Those requests mention rdg files rather than rdb files.  So I think this request is different.

Thanks
Chris.
comments.author: MrChriZ

comments.snippet:
Sorry, seems like I confused the two...

Whish you a wonderful day and a smooth migration
comments.author: simonai1254
